snippet.title: Blame Him - Part 1 | Full HD 60ᶠᵖˢ No Commentary
snippet.description:
Blame Him is true first-person survival horror. A game about surreal atmosphere and dark challenges. A bone-chilling experience made by 2 people from Japan.

Subscribe Now! ► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBxWegSS5QtpWBSi6fLUm9A
Follow me on Twitter ► https://twitter.com/InsaneGamingXL

Play Blame Him ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/950400/

Basic Information
Played on : PC
Difficulty: Normal 
Title: Blame Him
Status: Complete
Developer: Chilla's Art
Publisher: Chilla's Art
Genre: Horror Adventure
Release Date: Jun 2, 2019
Type: Singleplayer
